mapper.insert: insert into goods_file ( id, type, target_id, pic, sort_order, status, is_del, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime )values ( #{id}, #{type}, #{targetId}, #{pic}, #{sortOrder}, #{status}, #{isDel}, #{creator}, #{ctime}, #{modifier}, #{mtime} )
mapper.update:
update goods_file
id=#{id},
type=#{type},
target_id=#{targetId},
pic=#{pic},
sort_order=#{sortOrder},
status=#{status},
is_del=#{isDel},
creator=#{creator},
ctime=#{ctime},
modifier=#{modifier},
mtime=#{mtime},
id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, type, target_id, pic, sort_order, status, is_del, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime from goods_file where id=#{id}
select id, type, target_id, pic, sort_order, status, is_del, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime from goods_file where id=#{id}

select id, type, target_id, pic, sort_order, status, is_del, creator, ctime, modifier, mtime
limit #{offset},#{rows}
